product.title: Splash Scarlet Red Panel Blind
product.description: Their moisture-resistant splash scarlet red panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold red panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.
